column4: windows 7 is different then xp, it uses a completely different boot loader. i ran into issues trying to install linux over it. you might need to just pop in your win 7 disk, restore the boot sector and then you should be able to access windows
well >.> if i really really wanted to I could just pop in my windows xp os and try using it that way but My computer was setup for windows 7 and i need to learn how to use 7 well for IT problems
yeah, pop in the win 7 disk, restore boot sector, it will allow you to get back into windows
you can deal with the rest later when you learn your way around
